Resting on the corner of a quiet court, this fully renovated home is an open plan delight that delivers the kind of indoor-outdoor lifestyle modern families dream of.

Description:
The Trifecta of Choice
Impeccably designed and built to reach the highest of expectations, these three brand new townhouses invite the interest from all buyers groups. Situated close to shops and transport, these homes are completed to impressive standards to incorporate welcoming creature comforts like ducted heating and evaporative cooling found on both levels, as well as introducing stunning Spotted Gum engineered flooring and stone bench tops in the kitchen. The choice is yours from the front four bedroom layout which heads the group of three with street frontage, with two bathrooms, to the rear two options which both offer three bedrooms with two bathrooms. Double garages, a crisp white interior, high ceilings, quality Bosch stainless steel appliances, carpeted bedrooms with either built in or walk in robes for the master, along with open plan living and dining, security systems and landscaped gardens with a shed and a water tank are also featured.
